Reviews.Title: A good intermediate level phone
Reviews.Author: Albam
Reviews.Content: "A good intermediate level phone" is what I wanted and what I got. My previous phone was a small Galaxy Y Duos S6102 and I was looking for a bigger and newer phone, not very expensive or sophisticated, which would keep me using two SIM (one for personal issues and the other for public matters)That's the Galaxy Grand i9082, a phone with some special functions found in Galaxy S3 and other in Galaxy Note. A phone somehow beetween those two, but cheaper that both of them.A good size to read your mail and even the news, and a good collection of modern and functional apps included (or to be included afterwards).By the way, I live in Costa Rica and works perfectly with local phone companies, either with postpaid or prepeaid chips. .

Reviews.Title: Usable and value for money
Reviews.Author: Anastasia D.
Reviews.Content: Samsung Galaxy Grand i9082L is a great phone for the casual user. Games (esp small ones) play well and so do the videos. The videos can also be zoomed in which is a feature most low end phones don't have. Usability is great. Battery life is average nothing better than the usual Samsung fare. I bought it in White and it looks and feels great.

Reviews.Title: Very sastisfied
Reviews.Author: Engelberth Rivero
Reviews.Content: the operation is performed as agreed all ok very very satisfied very responsible company and the product quality is very good for me I have recommended 100%

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD PHONE
Reviews.Author: Pedro Silva
Reviews.Content: NICE PHONE I LIKE IT  Samsung Galaxy Grand i9082L Dual Sim Phone. GOOD CAMARAS AND DISPLAY. I AM VERY PLEASE WITH TWO LINE PHONE

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Gabriel-uy "Gabriel-uy"
Reviews.Content: Since I saw a friend just wanted one. I found it very easy to handle and is a very quick and fast phone. Also very complete. I am very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Coco
Reviews.Content: Works great, not complaint from me. Sound is good and screen size is good for internet browsing. Good bye nice.

Reviews.Title: it could be a grat phone
Reviews.Author: Enigma Dominicano
Reviews.Content: I bougth it to use in Dominican Republic (The Caribbean) and in the 3rd day of use was power off for low battery, to the next day I try to power On and it only show the Samsung Logo and the model of the phone.have to say that the Costumer Service was very nice, they recibe my complain and give me the refund, but I have to paid like the 20% of the cost of equipment to get back.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Wendy Nicholas
Reviews.Content: Excellent. There was one problem I was not fully aware of how to put the APN. And there was no direction.  And it would be nice it it was 4G. But otherwise great phone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Liza A.
Reviews.Content: Excellent phone! It is a little bigger han the S4 but still very easy to manage  and use! The processor it is fast.!

Reviews.Title: Great phone , great price !!
Reviews.Author: Marcelo farro
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone 2 weeks ago , by now its working fine and i really love it. Good colors and definition , the size of the screen its perfect for me and its thin , light and i can handle it very well.The S voice its very useful too.

Reviews.Title: Software crashes often, brightness changes automatically, sound is low keyboard sucks
Reviews.Author: Ram
Reviews.Content: Software crashes often, brightness changes automatically, sound is low keyboard sucks. Nt sure how to rectify as I bought at amazon

ProductInfo.Features:
5.0" TFT capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors
8 MP (3264x2448 pixels) camera w/ autofocus, LED flash, Geo-tagging, touch focus, face and smile detection, image stabilization and secondary 2MP camera
HD (1080p@30fps) video recording w/ stereo sound rec.
Dual-core 1.2 GHz Cortex-A9 CPU
Android OS, v4.1.2 (Jelly Bean)
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy Grand i9082L Dual Sim Phone Latin American Version/Warranty 3G , 8MP Camera, 8GB, Dual-Core Blue
